sentences.en: A view from the cliffside chalet that dominates the valley.
sentences.cn: 从能俯瞰山谷的悬崖上的农舍所看到的风景.

sentences.en: An easily - run chalet near a safe beach - what more can you want for a family holiday?
sentences.cn: 一栋便于管理的别墅,且靠近海滩 — 对于家庭度假来说,你还想要什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: Family skiing holidays from this chalet specialist designed around families. UK based.
sentences.cn: 从在家庭附近设计的这位农舍式的房屋专家的家庭滑雪假期. 基于的英国.

sentences.en: Like all French Resistance veterans , Chalet wore his pink ribbon with conspicuous pride.
sentences.cn: 像所有的法国抵抗运动老战士一样,夏莱十分自豪地佩戴着他的粉红缓带.

sentences.en: Promoting sign language would also help to bring the hearing and hearing - impaired worlds Chalet added.
sentences.cn: 查特勒称,推广手语还能促进有声和无声世界的沟通.

sentences.en: Specialists in chalet and lodging accommodation in ski resorts throughout Europe and North America.
sentences.cn: 在农舍式的房屋的专家和在在整个欧洲和北美洲的滑雪胜地的住宿住所.

sentences.en: The skis are stacked outside the chalet.
sentences.cn: 滑雪板在农舍堆了一堆.

sentences.en: They follow the roof slopes and thus contribute to the rooms chalet - style warm atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 它们随着屋顶坡度走,从而在房间内营造出类似山区小木屋的温暖氛围.

sentences.en: We struggled through the deep snow back to the chalet.
sentences.cn: 我们踩着厚厚的积雪艰难地回到了小木屋.

sentences.en: Welcome to the chalet Swiss Restaurant.

words.tran_cn: 瑞士山中的牧人小屋；瑞士的农舍；小屋

trans.tran_cn: （屋顶陡斜的）木造农舍，小木屋，（尤指瑞士的）山地农舍式房子，（街道）公厕
trans.tran_en: a small house, especially in a  holiday camp
